original_text: As King Jehoshaphat prayed, all the men of Judah were standing there at the temple. They had their babies, their wives and their children with them.
korean_text: 유다 모든 사람들이 그들의 아내와 자녀와 어린이와 더불어 여호와 앞에 섰더라

sentences.original_text: all the men of Judah were standing there
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 모든 남자들이 그곳에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They had their babies with them
their wives and their children with them
